June 27, 2024 - Vivona Brands is a leading multi-brand platform of beauty, wellness and lifestyle products. Beauty products are sold under the Korean beauty umbrella brand OhK!, as well as under its Japanese beauty brand Koburi. Wellness products are sold under the umbrella brand Luna & Rae.
